Aug 12, 2013

OCTanner Website

Posted in Websites

Role: Front-End Developer View Website

This elegant website is developed using the static site generator Jekyll. It is a front-end only website, without any back-end components. We had a small development team, and I worked with two developers on this project who were off-site. I built the modules and templates. My favorite one is the Bridal section. Individual pages on this website are built using different templates and each template contains multiple modules.

Desktop

Mobile

Lin likes the Internet so she became a developer. Thanks for taking a look at her portfolio.
